Message.Text: Frank, I just don't get it. How are these kids sharing their code on Snapchat? It doesn't even seem like a place you'd do that.
Tommy, they're not using Snapchat. It's Discord—way more fitting for code sharing with channels and text formatting.
But... wait, Discord? No, no, I could’ve sworn I heard them say Snapchat. Why would they use Discord?
Because Discord's built for this kind of stuff. You can share files, code snippets, and have discussions. Snapchat doesn’t even have a setup for that.
Yeah, but... how are they organizing all this on Snapchat? I really don’t understand how it works for code.
They're not using Snapchat! It’s definitely Discord, Tommy. That’s why it makes sense.
I don't know, Frank... I could be missing something, but Snapchat still feels like the answer somehow.
